summary: Makes the player about as tall as a giant, increases speed and jump height.
descriptionHtml:
A simple batch file that goes directly into the Skyrim folder where the TESV.exe file is located.
After extracting to the Skyrim folder, run the game and open the console by pressing the \"~\"
button, type \"bat supersizeme\" without the quotation marks, hit enter, and close the console.

V1.1
To revert to normal size, open the console and type \"bat defaultsize\"
To shrink character, open the console and type \"bat downsizeme\"

This is the result of my messing around with the console and ultimately 
zapping heaps of weirdness into my game. 
My first upload to the site,too, so don\'t go too hard pls.
Hope You Like It!

Remember to endorse if you like,
and please, if you have  any advice concerning files like this, do tell!
author: Supersnert

files.name: SuperSizeMe now with shrink and default size commands
